description.narrative: By 2017, the capacities of the education system are reinforced to improve the enrollment of out-of-school children, especially children with disabilities, girls living in rural areas and other vulnerable children, including during emergency situations

related-activity.ref: 6690/A0/05/092 OUTCOME2: EDUCATION DE QUALITÉ POUR TOUS

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2017, the capacities of the education system are reinforced to improve the enrollment of out-of-school children, especially children with disabilities, girls living in rural areas and other vulnerable children, including during emergency situations

description.narrative: UNICEF has continued its advocacy to ensure the education of the most vulnerable children most of whom remains out-of-school especially refugee children, migrant, nomad children, girls in rural areas and disable children. The education of these children has been highlighted in the new education strategic plan. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:14/01/2018
